name: Chiroform Millennium Car Lumbar Support Cushion
descr:
MILLENNIUM CAR LUMBAR SUPPORT CUSHION SOFT
 
With Chiroform Millennium Car Lumbar Support Cushion, which is especially developed for car seats, you retain the natural curve in your back while seated. The lumbar vertebrae retain their natural position and muscles relaxes. The lumbar support can be used both as relief at already encountered problems and prevention.

Chiroform Car Lumbar Cushion (soft version) is made from a solid foam core coated with viscoelastic memory foam

Delivered with a soft and comfortable velvet cover, including strap. Stitched inner cover.
